attributes.action: consider a mascot scheme to link one music pop band with a different batallion in the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea of my petition is to reassure our MoD staff serving overseas that they are appreciated and we care about them. This could have a fund - raising and moral - boosting role - like  a mascot.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
